verses.roman:
vṛndāvana-līlāya kṛṣṇera sahāya gopī-gaṇa
gopī-gaṇa vinā kṛṣṇera harite nāre mana

synonyms: vṛndāvana-līlāya—in the pastimes of Vṛndāvana; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; sahāya—assistants; gopī-gaṇa—all the gopīs; gopī-gaṇa vinā—except for the gopīs; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; harite—to attract; nāre—no one is able; mana—the mind.
translation: "In the pastimes of Vṛndāvana, the only assistants are the gopīs. But for the gopīs, no one can attract the mind of Kṛṣṇa."
